import React from 'react' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import './menu-item.styles.scss' import { MenuItemContainer, ContentContainer, ContentTitle } from './menu-item.styles' const Menu = ({ title, imageUrl ,size ,history,linkUrl ,match}) => { return( history.push(`${match.url}${linkUrl}`)}> {title.toUpperCase()}

SHOP ) } export default withRouter(Menu)
